comments.body: Do we need 2 projects for this? Could it be one APK with 2 activities and then launching it via adb am differently? (not sure how to do it)

I think we could technically combine all 3 projects into 1 project. The question would be, should a developer have to move around the "MAIN" category in the manifest by hand before being able to run one of the three projects? If you think that's OK, then I can combine them. If it would be better to keep it easier to run for verification, then we would want to keep them separate. What do you think?
Spoke offline. We'll keep the projects separate for now.
